summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2743 for the improvement of Dearborn Street, from Hiawatha Place to Alley East of Nineteenth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of a sewer of the proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks and catch basins with their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 32567, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
